# Brief information about CIRG (Clinical Informatics Research Group)

== Who are we? ==

iSante is on of the many projects that is run by the Clinical Informatics Research Group (CIRG) a research group centrally located at the University of Washington. We are involved in research projects focused in the following areas:
  * E-health Architecture
  * Clinical systems implementation, management, and development
  * Health Reporting Architectures
  * Laboratory systems implementation, management, and development
  * Health Policy
